decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - No development shall take place until samples of the materials to be used in the construction of the A2 unit (shopfront and fascia sign) have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (1301A - 02/KG; 1301A - 08/KG; 1301 - 09/KG; 1301 - 10/KG; 1301A - 11/KG; 1301A - 12/KG; 1301A -13/KG; 1301A -14/KG; 1301A -15/KG; Unnumbered Design and Access Statement. Received: 24/02/2017.
1301A - 01/KG REV: B. Received: 01/03/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No development shall take place until a roof plan is submitted to an approved in writing by the local planning authority which shows the glazing panels and those to be obscurely glazed to protect the privacy of upper floor residential properties along the southern boundary of the site. The approved glazing panels shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise in accordance with the agreed details.

Condition : 5 - The access doorway to the premises shall have a minimum clear width of 900mm, a level surface or ramp between the pavement and the floor and a door handle of not more than 1m above ground level.

Condition : 6 - The use of the premises shall only be for Class A2 uses only, with the exception of the use of the premises as a betting shop, which shall be prohibited.
In respect of any of the above Class A2 uses hereby approved, notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, as amended, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification; the use shall not be changed to any other Use Class without further approval in writing from the local planning authority.

Condition : 7 - The use of the premises (A2 use, excluding betting shop use) shall not be carried on outside the following times:
8:00am to 6:00pm on Mondays to Fridays
9:00am to 5:00pm on Saturdays
10:00am to 4:00pm on Sundays and Public Holidays
Condition : 8 - Notwithstanding the approved drawings, there shall be a maximum of three rooflights to the roof of the premises.
Condition : 9 - No fans, louvres, ducts or other external plant shall be installed on the premises without the prior approval of the local planning authority.
description: Increase of roof height to accommodate mezzanine level and alterations to rear fenestration
